ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets
4 tbsp deSiam Satay Sauce Coconut & Peanut Dip,
300g pack Waitrose Asian Fusion Rice Noodles
¼ cucumber, halved, seeded and thinly sliced
1 lime, cut into wedges for squeezing over

instructions.step: Brush the chicken breasts lightly with sunflower oil and grill or griddle for 6–7 minutes on each side until nicely browned and cooked through with no pink meat.
Cut the chicken into 1cm-wide strips and place in a bowl. Pour over the peanut sauce, toss well together and set aside to cool.
Meanwhile, cook the soya beans in boiling water for 2–3 minutes until tender, then drain and cool under cold running water.

Place the beans in a large bowl and add the noodles, carrots, radishes, cabbage, cucumber and salad onions. Toss well together and divide between 4 serving bowls. Place a good helping of satay chicken strips and sauce on top of each salad, drizzle with a little extra sauce if wanted, then scatter over the peanuts, garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.
